text: Ithocritus ruber is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Frederick William Hope in 1839. It is known from India, Bangladesh, and Vietnam.BioLib.cz - Ithocritus ruber. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Lamiinae Category:Beetles described in 1839
title: Ithocritus ruber
